description:
Story
Pearl and Grey find a treasure map.
The two rivals compete with each other...
Take control of Grey and clear 100 stages to reach the treasure first!

Game System
An easy-to-learn puzzle action game with lots of variety!
Collect key items and open the door in puzzle stages.
Face off against Pearl in battle stages!

Controls
Left/Right: Move
Up/Down: Move up/down ladders
B: Jump
X: Hook shot (when held in inventory)
+: Pause
R & +: Game menu (Volume and language settings)

The "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series of games created using the action game creation software "Pixel Game Maker MV" that can be enjoyed on the Nintendo Switchâ„¢.
name: Pixel Game Maker Series Pearl Vs Grey
intro:
Pearl and Grey's battle for treasure.
A great adventure across 100 stages!
